>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/plex/pin/{pinId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Checks if the user has completed authorization at plex.tv/link. Returns authToken when authorized.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"query","name":"clientId","required":true},{"schema":{"type":"number"},"in":"path","name":"pinId","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}

>
  
</StatusCodes>
